snippet.title: BIRK'S ADVENTURE [Donut Games - Collectors ID #43]
snippet.description:
Help Birk unravel a mysterious attack on the once so peaceful Kingdom of Nidala in this ADVENTUROUS retro inspired LITE RPG.

The game features a non-linear and casual friendly gameplay, where you can explore the kingdom freely with the help of an enchanted map that keeps track of all places you visit. If you run out of energy, you'll respawn in the last room you entered.

The kingdom is full of dungeons, each locked with a golden key.
Once inside, you'll be able to unearth hidden treasures, find upgrades to your character and recover items that need to be returned to the holy temple.

External controllers are supported, such as the XBox One controller on iOS and bluetooth joy pads on Android.
